faq.globalSearchTitle: How does global article search work?
faq.globalSearchContent: The global search on the main page allows you to quickly find any article by its ID. After entering the ID, its exact location in the warehouse will be displayed, including rack, shelf, and store.
faq.barcodeScannerTitle: How to use the barcode scanner?
faq.barcodeScannerContent: In the 'Scan Barcode' section, use your device's camera to scan the article's barcode. The application will automatically recognize the code and redirect you to the article's location detail page.
faq.massAddArticlesTitle: How does mass article adding work?
faq.massAddArticlesContent: This feature allows you to quickly add multiple articles to a single shelf. First, you lock the shelf details (rack, shelf number). Then you can scan barcodes or enter article IDs manually. All added articles are saved at once.
faq.articleManagementContent: In the 'Article Management' section, you can add new articles, edit existing ones (change name, status, quantity), or delete them. Administrators manage global (default) articles here.
faq.rackManagementContent: In 'Rack Management', you can define the warehouse structure. Add new racks, specify the number of shelves, and add descriptions for better orientation.
faq.changePasswordTitle: How can I change my password?
faq.changePasswordContent: In 'Account Settings', you will find the 'Change Password' option. Enter your new password and confirm it to secure your account.
faq.themeLanguageTitle: How to change the theme and language?
faq.themeLanguageContent: In the top right corner of the application, you will find icons to change the language (globe icon) and theme (sun/moon icon). You can choose between light, dark, and system themes.
faq.externalLinksTitle: What are the external links for?
faq.externalLinksContent: On the main page, you will find quick links to important external systems like MyJysk and Storefront for easy access.
faq.lowStockAlertsTitle: What do low stock alerts mean?
faq.lowStockAlertsContent: An alert will appear on the main page if the quantity of an article drops below the set minimum level. This helps you to order more stock in time.
faq.barcodeGeneratorTitle: How to generate a barcode for an article?
faq.barcodeGeneratorContent: In the article list, you will find a QR code icon next to each item. Clicking it will open a dialog where you can generate and print a label with a QR code for that article.

adminFaq.siteDashboardOverviewContent: The main site dashboard provides a quick overview of key metrics: total number of users, stores, articles, and racks. Charts visualize the distribution of users across stores and other important statistics.
adminFaq.storeManagementContent: In the 'Stores' section, you can add new stores, edit their names, or delete them. When adding a new store, you have the option to automatically upload the default set of global articles.
adminFaq.userManagementContent: In the 'Users' section, you manage all user accounts. You can approve new registrations, add new users, edit their details, and assign them roles. In the 'Roles' section, you define permissions for each role.
adminFaq.globalArticleManagementContent: Global articles serve as a template for newly created stores. Here you can add, edit, and delete articles that will be automatically uploaded to every new store.
adminFaq.helpPostManagementContent: Create and manage content for the Help Center. You can add new posts, edit existing ones, and target them to all users or only administrators.
adminFaq.logViewerContent: Monitor all activity in the system. You can filter logs by action type or store, which facilitates auditing and troubleshooting.
adminFaq.exportDataContent: Export data about users, stores, articles, and racks in CSV or JSON format for further analysis or backup.
adminFaq.copyArticlesContent: This feature allows you to copy a complete set of articles from one store to another. You can choose whether to overwrite existing articles in the target store.
adminFaq.adminTutorialsDescription: Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions and guides for managing the system.
